trans-unit.source: Represents one or more cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 表示一或多個三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store PolyBezierSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件來儲存 PolyBezierSegment 物件和其他區段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 三次方貝茲曲線由四個點所定義︰ 起點、 結束點和兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: A PolyBezierSegment specifies one or more cubic Bezier curves by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A> property to a collection of points.
trans-unit.target: PolyBezierSegment 藉由設定指定一或多個三次方貝茲曲線<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A>的點集合的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A>

trans-unit.source: For every three points in the collection, the first and second points specify the two control points of the curve and the third point specifies the end point.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個集合中的三個點，第一個和第二個點指定曲線的兩個控制點，然後第三個點指定的結束點。

trans-unit.source: Note that no start point for the curve is specified because start point is the same as the end point of the last segment.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為起始點的最後一個區段的結束點相同，確認已指定沒有曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點影響的開頭部分的曲線。第二個控制點會影響曲線的結束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> objects and a value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref>具有指定的集合類別<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>物件和值，指定是否圖案的區段。

trans-unit.source: The collection of points that specify the geometry of the cubic Bezier curve segments.
trans-unit.target: 指定三次方貝茲曲線線段的幾何的點集合。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否圖案的區段。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> that define this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"> </xref> ，定義這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Collection that define this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其中定義這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
